properties.name: source
properties.description: Load the workflow from the database by ID

properties.name: Local File
properties.description: Load the workflow from a locally saved file

properties.name: Parameter
properties.description: Load the workflow from a parameter

properties.name: URL
properties.description: Load the workflow from an URL

properties.name: workflowId
properties.description: Note on using an expression here: if this node is set to run once with all items, they will all be sent to the same workflow. That workflow's ID will be calculated by evaluating the expression for the first input item.

properties.name: workflowPath
properties.description: The path to local JSON workflow file to execute

properties.name: executeWorkflowNotice
properties.displayName: Any data you pass into this node will be output by the Execute Workflow Trigger. More info

properties.name: mode
properties.description: Pass all items into a single execution of the sub-workflow

properties.name: Run once for each item
properties.description: Call the sub-workflow individually for each item

properties.name: options
properties.description: Whether the main workflow should wait for the sub-workflow to complete its execution before proceeding
